title: Tour Down Under Top Takeaways: Del Toro’s Rise, Gigante’s Giant Surprise, and How an Unsung Welshman Pipped the ‘Super Teams’
content:
The WorldTour opener delivered some surprises with Sam Welsford and Sarah Gigante, but it also confirmed that the 'super teams' will be hard to beat in 2024.

Read the full article at Tour Down Under Top Takeaways: Del Toro’s Rise, Gigante’s Giant Surprise, and How an Unsung Welshman Pipped the ‘Super Teams’ on Velo.
author: ahood
